articles.title: US teen Jordan Stolz is first man to win three individual golds at speed skating worlds - The Guardian
articles.description: At the age of 18, Jordan Stolz already looks like one of the most dominant winter sports athletes on the planet
articles.content:
At the age of 18, Jordan Stolz already looks like one of the most dominant winter sports athletes on the planet.
On Sunday, he finished an extraordinary few days of success by becoming the first man… [+1873 chars]
